document_data.name: Eiruidin Ondaru
document_data.mainbody: '''Eiruidin Ondaru''' was a [[Pasha]] from upland [[Calimshan]] in the mid-13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Eiruidin Ondaru had taken a boy, [[Aralagath Tarsil]], for a favored pet, whom he kept collared and leashed until his own murder by his court [[wizard]], [[Ongraunnathan]], in {{yearlink|1275}}. After his death, the wizard used [[magic]] to make him appear to be alive, and reigned in his name until he was unmasked in {{yearlink|1286}}.
